description: Mikhail Mishustin, who got the role in January, is shown revealing his diagnosis on Russian TV.
title: Coronavirus: Russian PM Mishustin tests positive for virus
title_page: Coronavirus: Russian PM Mishustin tests positive for virus - BBC News
maintext: "If we see things are getting better, then of course we will reduce the restrictions. But until that happens, you need to be courageous and patient. It's very important for you and your health," he said.
